metadata.description:
Nightingale of Roses:

Oh dear roses, 
Your colour is so deep,
With magical fragrance & red leaf.
You are life of fertility & love,
Eternal & divine from above.

Edition: 1/1

Original Resolution: 4880x2160

Original File Size: 200 MB

Time Duration: 20 Seconds

Date of Creation: 22nd March 2022

License: NFT holder gets the right for advertising, private & public display, both in physical & virtual form. The creator owns the copyright.

Creator (Original Music & Artwork): Sachin Verma
